# Packages
```{r}
#| label: set-up
#| message: false

library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
# library(workflows)
# library(parsnip)

library(tidyclust)
```

# K-means Example

## Engine
```{r}
set.seed(1234)

kmeans_spec <- k_means(num_clusters = 3) %>%
  set_engine("stats")

kmeans_spec
```

## Fit
```{r}
kmeans_spec_fit <- kmeans_spec %>%
  fit(~., data = mtcars)
kmeans_spec_fit
```

## Predict
```{r}
predict(kmeans_spec_fit, mtcars[1:4, ])
```

## Get Clusters
```{r}
extract_cluster_assignment(kmeans_spec_fit)
```

## Get Centroids
```{r}
extract_centroids(kmeans_spec_fit)
```
